amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Office of the Inspector General by $800,000 for enforcement of animal fighting statutes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds, by transfer, by $800,000 , for the animal fighting provisions of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 179 (Roll no. 355).
